sen.j: 岩滝温泉（いわたきおんせん）は、京都府与謝郡与謝野町（旧岩滝町）（旧国丹後国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Iwataki Hot Spring is located in Yosano-cho (former Iwataki Town) (Tango province (old province)), Yosano-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
Iwataki Hot Spring is located in Yosano-cho (former Iwataki Town) (Tango province (old province)), Yosano-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
Iwataki Hot Spring is located in Yosano-cho (former Iwataki-cho) (Tango Province (old province)), Yosa-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: スペルミスを修正し、表記を-choに統一しました。"province" -> "Province"

sen.j: 北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線岩滝口駅下車。
sen.e: The nearest station is Iwatakiguchi Station on the Miyazu Line of Kitakinki Tango Railway.
The nearest station is Iwatakiguchi Station on the Miyazu Line of Kitakinki Tango Railway.
The nearest station is Iwatakiguchi Station on the Miyazu Line of Kitakinki Tango Railway.
Chloride infused earth, hydrogen surphide springs
sen.cmt: スペルミスを修正しました。

tit.cmt: 既出の用語と統一しました。

sen.j: 温泉宿が一件と、町営の日帰り温泉施設「クアハウス岩滝」がある。
sen.e: One hot-spring hotel, and a municipal hot-spring facility without accommodations, "Qua House Iwataki," exist.
The area has a hot-spring hotel, and a municipal hot-spring facility without accommodations, "Qua House Iwataki."
The area has a hot-spring hotel, and a municipal hot-spring facility without accommodations, "Qua House Iwataki."
